tool.name: IRFinder for Galaxy
tool.description: This runs IRFinder in BAM mode. Requires single IRFinder reference and returns aggregated output
tool.command: #if str($mode_condition.mode) == "main": ${__tool_directory__}/irfinder_galaxy main '$mode_condition.input' '$mode_condition.ref' $output1 $output2 #else if str($mode_condition.mode) == "gen_map_reads": ${__tool_directory__}/irfinder_galaxy gen_map_reads '$mode_condition.ref' $output3 $mode_condition.read_len $mode_condition.read_stride #else if str($mode_condition.mode) == "process_mappability_bam": ${__tool_directory__}/irfinder_galaxy process_mappability_bam '$mode_condition.input' $output4 $mode_condition.threshold #end if

param.name: input
param.label: Mapped Mappability Reads (BAM)
param.help: An aligned file of mapped Mappability reads

data.name: output3
data.label: Mappability Reads
data.help: Align these reads using your preferred aligner

data.name: output4
data.label: Mappability Regions
data.help: Use this file to build a reference from within R, using NxtIRF::BuildReference()
